name: Pteromones
description:
The Earth needs you! An evil empiere of space pufferfishes are trying to invade Earth! Commando your Pterodactyl by activating and deactivating the pheromones of the other pterodactyls by pressing space. Restart the level with r.

I've made this game in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, which has the theme Joined Together. Hope you like it, would love if you rated it here: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1084443
